text: aur raho apane gharon mein aur saundary ka pradarshan na karo, pratham agyaan yug ke pradarshan ke samaan tatha namaaz kee sthaapana karo, zakaat do tatha aagya paalan karo allaah aur usake rasool kee. allaah chaahata hai ki malinata ko door kar de tumase, he nabee kee ghar vaaliyo! tatha tumhen pavitr kar de,, ati pavitr
